New Records: CJ McCollum tied an NBA record for 50 or more points and 10+ three-pointers in less than 35 minutes, joining Steph Curry and Klay Thompson to accomplish that
Key Match Events: Pelicans ended their 11-game losing streak with a 132-120 victory over the Washington Wizards
CJ McCollum scored 50 points in just 30 minutes of play
Pre-Game Insights: This season is not how CJ McCollum expected it to go, but he still approaches every game the right way
Post-Match Reflections: CJ McCollum reflected on his career night with the media and what it took to get the Pelicans the victory
He admitted this season is not how he expected it to go, but he still approaches every game the right way
Miscellaneous Highlights: CJ McCollum was traded to New Orleans from the Portland Trail Blazers during the 2022 season
Constant injuries to Brandon Ingram and Zion Williamson have kept New Orleans at the bottom of the standings
Others: CJ McCollum goes to the gym at night and misses a lot of time from his family putting time into the game
